name: Offline for SCP Foundation Database -Anomaly and Paranormal DB
name_original: Offline for SCP Foundation Database -Anomaly and Paranormal DB
description:
This is the offline version of the SCP Foundation Database Wiki.

The SCP Foundation is a fictional organization that records entities, locations, objects and phenomena that violate natural law (referred to as SCPs). Thousands of foundation tales are contained in the website for those who are interested in supernatural and also for writers and screenwriters.

Features:

-3000 SCPs for reading
-Favorites option to save specific entries
-Handy search engine
-No Internet required


Attribution and Disclaimer
This app uses material from the SCP Database at scp-wiki and is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-Share Alike 3.0 License.
This is an UNOFFICIAL database for the SCP Foundation. It is developed by an independent developer, not affiliated to the official developer or publisher. All content, images and logos are the property of their respective owners, and usage in this app falls within guidelines of "fair use".
